content: वेगः [विज्-घञ्] {@--1@} Impulse, impetus. {@--2@} Speed, velocity, rapidity. {@--3@} Agitation. {@--4@} Impetuosity, violence, force. {@--5@} A stream, current; as in अंबुवेगः. {@--6@} Energy, activity, determination. {@--7@} Power, strength; मदनज्वरस्य वेगात् <ls>K.</ls> {@--8@} Circulation, working, effect (as of poison); <ls>U. 2. 26</ls>, <ls>V. 5. 18.</ls> {@--9@} Haste, rashness, sudden impulse; <ls>Pt. 1. 109.</ls> {@--10@} The flight of an arrow; <ls>Ki. 13. 24.</ls> {@--11@} Love, passion. {@--12@} The external manifestation of an internal emotion. {@--13@} Delight, pleasure. {@--14@} Evacuation of the feces. {@--15@} Semen virile. {@--16@} Pleasure, delight.
